lines.text: We've got no food, no compass, no trail, no-- no way to get the hell out of here... but we do have one thing. We've got the biggest damn lawsuit against this church for sending a bunch of minors out into the butt-freakin' amazon with absolutely no preparation for a disaster of this magnitude. This is asinine.

We can't be rational. We've never been trained to be rational. We live in a post-modern society which means it's impossible for us to be rational! This country's made up of a bunch of brainless shitheads.
